doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: 1761; alteration: 1789; alteration: 1905; alteration: 1934; alteration: 1940s; alteration: 1980s; alteration: 1994; alteration: 1999

Stair Scroll Bracket like Esmont, Brookhill & Carrsbrook--Painted Floor Patterns by Audrey Emery owner 1944-52, who 1st married Dimitri Pavlovich, 1st Grand Duke of Czarist Russia, then 2nd married Georgian Prince Dimitri Djordjadze--Rev Joseph P B Wilmer Home, Bishop of New Orleans, mid 19th century--Became a thoroughbred horse farm whose stud Princequillo sired the winner of the 1962 Irish Grand National

1 Story Frame 3 Bay + Brick I-House 5 Bay, H-plan, Paired Column Portico, Summer Living Room, Greek Fret Moldings, Candlestick Moldings, Interesting Mantels, Overmantel, Bulkhead, Wood Gutters & Downspouts, Beaded Siding, Punkah, Pitsaw Marks, Mortise and Tenon Joinery, Pegged Joinery, Roman Numerals, Rose Head Nails, Transom, 6 Panel Doors, Self Closing Door Hinges, 6/6, 9/6, 6/9, 9/9, Blinds, Barred Cellar Windows, Winter Kitchen,Smokehouse, Kitchen, Gardens

Milton Grigg, Architect 20th century--Michael Osteen, Architect, outbuilding late 20th century--Blake Caravati, Builder 1980s--John Meder, Architect, south portico 1994--Bethany C. Puopolo, northeast addition 1999
survey data: National Register of Historic Places--Virginia Landmarks Register--Architecture in Virginia--Virginia Road Traces%Mutual Assurance Society Insurance Policy--Work Projects Administration
